title: 'The Great Resignation', Best of Voicemails!
description:
Bomani Jones begins to wrap things up for 2021 with an IYHH that includes why "The Great Resignation" doesn't tell the full story of labor during the pandemic (0:53), and shares some of our most memorable voicemail segments from the last year (13:08)!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: We're gonna wrap the year with a new #iyhh, plus some of our best voicemails!
